name: Igor Reis Braziel
shortResume: I build modern and intuitive web applications using Next.js, React, Django, Spring Boot and more. I also have knowledge in Data Science and Machine Learning using Python. I'm a competent professional who is always working on projects and improving my skills.
about: I’m Igor, a Computer Science student at the Federal University of Goiás (since 2023) with a passion for technology, problem-solving, and continuous learning. I thrive in collaborative environments, where teamwork and shared ideas lead to stronger results, and I adapt quickly to new tools, challenges, and opportunities. With determination, focus, and dedication, I aim to grow into a professional who builds meaningful solutions and contributes positively to every team I join.
